Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Brazilian \Bra*zil"ian\ (br[.a]*z[i^]l"yan), prop. a. Of or pertaining to Brazil. -- n. A native or an inhabitant of Brazil. [1913 Webster]
{Brazilian pebble}. See {Pebble}, n., 2. [1913 Webster]
Brazilian adj : of or relating to or characteristic of Brazil or the people of Brazil n : a native or inhabitant of Brazil
